title: Iron imp
data:

|   | An ugly, twisted little minor demon with metal skin. |

## Useful Info

**Iron imps** are relatively burly [tier-5 demons](/Tier-5_demon "Tier-5 demon"). They have the most [HP](/HP "HP") of all the imps and decent attacks, but they're slow, and almost never appear where they'd actually be a threat. They can only be found as part of certain [vaults](/Vault "Vault").

## Tips & Tricks

- If you're concerned about them being a threat in melee, they're easy to [kite](/Kite "Kite").

## History

- Prior to [0.30](/0.30 "0.30"), they could be created by [Call Imp](/Call_Imp "Call Imp"). Of the imps summoned by that spell, they were the physically toughest.
- Prior to [0.7](/0.7 "0.7"), iron imps were called **manes**, a name that was both singular and plural.

Iron imp

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
iron imp 5 
HP 10-22
HD 3
XP 40
Speed 8
AC 6
EV 8
Will 10
Attack1 12 (hit: plain)


Resistances rF+++
rC+
rElec
rPois+
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities Holy
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Demonic
Size Small
Type iron imp, iron imp
Flags
Speaks
An ugly, twisted little minor demon with metal skin.

Useful Info

Iron imps are relatively burly tier-5 demons. They have the most HP of all the imps and decent attacks, but they're slow, and almost never appear where they'd actually be a threat. They can only be found as part of certain vaults.

Tips & Tricks

  • If you're concerned about them being a threat in melee, they're easy to kite.

History

  • Prior to 0.30, they could be created by Call Imp. Of the imps summoned by that spell, they were the physically toughest.
  • Prior to 0.7, iron imps were called manes, a name that was both singular and plural.

rawPage:
{{version030}}
{{monster info}}
==Useful Info==
'''Iron imps''' are relatively burly [[tier-5 demon]]s. They have the most [[HP]] of all the imps and decent attacks, but they're slow, and almost never appear where they'd actually be a threat. They can only be found as part of certain [[vault]]s.

==Tips & Tricks==
*If you're concerned about them being a threat in melee, they're easy to [[kite]].

==History==
*Prior to [[0.30]], they could be created by [[Call Imp]]. Of the imps summoned by that spell, they were the physically toughest.
*Prior to [[0.7]], iron imps were called '''manes''', a name that was both singular and plural.

[[Category:Demon]]
